articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Volvo Cars shares drop to record low as Geely trims stake - Reuters
articles.description: Shares of Swedish automaker Volvo Cars (VOLCARb.ST) fell as much as 14% to a record low on Friday after its majority shareholder, China's Geely
articles.content: OSLO, Nov 17 (Reuters) - Shares of Swedish automaker Volvo Cars (VOLCARb.ST) fell as much as 14% to a record low on Friday after its majority shareholder, China's Geely (0175.HK), sold a small part o… [+1509 chars]
